author: Nick Daino
install_msg: Thanks for adding this repo! Available cogs: NFLGames, NHLGames, MLBGames, NBAGames (sports schedules from PlainTextSports) and BristolConditions (ski conditions).
name: cogs
short: Personal collection of Red-Discord Bot cogs
description: A collection of personal Red-Discord Bot cogs including NFL, NHL, MLB, NBA game schedules and Bristol Mountain ski conditions.
